Production of quotes. Order Analysis and Validation
control, packaging and shipping of goods sold.
Political instability (risk of war, terrorism, local conflict, attacks ...)

field.name: description
field.p: Risk of loss of business or profitability outside the company's natural boundary, due to geopolitical instability in the area of presence.

ul.li: Issues related to the safety of people and property.
Loss of turnover and/or profitability.
Economic and financial losses.
Reputational risk; risk of business failure.

field.name: control
field.p: Monitor all geopolitical indicators available, from multiple sources (Ministries, Banks, International Institutions). Monitor local and regional situation, implement micromanagement on site.

field.name: action
field.p: In-depth knowledge of the country concerned and its associated risks. Mastering the geopolitical issues of the geographical area of exposure. Reduction of the presence, repositioning of critical processes, exit of the zone, Avoidance strategy, reduction strategy.

record.field: Unfavorable economic climate impacting the dynamics of the company's activity: inflation, slowdown, GDP decline, unemployment

field.name: description
field.p: Deteriorating economic conditions for carrying out business activities

ul.li: Economic crisis of local, regional, national or global impact;
unemployment, decline in purchasing power B2B or B2C;
deterioration of public accounts, over-indebtedness, economic failure of a branch of activity.
Loss of turnover, loss of business opportunities, loss of relative or absolute market shares.
Loss business development opportunity.
customer insolvency.

field.name: control
field.p: Growth rate of the turnover. Turnover rate of the offer. Failure rate on launching new offers. Fine management of the company's activity levels (production, storage and consumption cycles)

field.name: action
field.p: Adaptability and flexibility of the strategic and production model of the company: reactivity of the supply the evolution of the demand, adaptation of the structure of production and cost of the offer; risk reduction strategy to be favored.

record.field: Poor identification or poor definition of the strategic segments of the strategic business model

field.name: description
field.p: Incorrect determination of the strategic business model segments to which the commercial offer is deployed.

ul.li: Bad knowledge of the market.
Bad segmentation of customers / prospects database.
Mismatch between Commercial offers and market demand.
Inability to market the produced offers on the desired customer segments;
Loss of sales, deterioration of the company's economic conditions.

field.name: control
field.p: Success rate of the marketing of the offer by strategic segment. Number of strategic segments. Dimensioning and validated consistency of the strategic business model

field.name: action
field.p: Precise analysis of target market, anticipated segments, and customer profiles making up each strategic segment. Precise identification of the specific needs of each client and consistency of the offer that is intended for them. Risk circumvention or reduction strategy.

field.name: description
field.p: Inability of the company to meet its financial commitments, for lack of liquid cash.

ul.li: Poorly controlled need in working capital
Structural inadequacy of the upper part of the company's balance sheet
Lack of appropriate cash flow forecast
Significant delay in a customer payment
unavailability of suitable short-term financing solutions.

field.name: consequence
field.p: Unpaid bills, cash-flow difficulties, which may lead to a situation of cessation of payments leading to the opening of a bankruptcy or liquidation procedure.

field.name: control
field.p: Daily situation of the current cash position; cash flow forecasts; number of days and amounts of anticipated overruns; rate and degree of use of short-term financing schemes
